intro: Drymocodon latifolium, commonly known as the broadleaf drymocodon, is a flowering plant species belonging to the family Ericaceae. It is characterized by its broad, ovate leaves that are typically arranged alternately along the stems. Due to its ornamental value and ecological importance, it is sometimes cultivated in gardens and conservation areas.
